title: Countries with the largest number of cosmetic procedures 2018

gold: Cosmetic procedures are popular among people that want to enhance select features of their body through surgical and nonsurgical methods.
As of 2018 , the United States had the largest number of cosmetic procedures during that year with over 4.3 million procedures.
Brazil had the second largest number of cosmetic procedures with almost 2.3 million procedures during that year .
